AT.name: Ultimate NES™ Remix
AT.description: In „Ultimate NES™ Remix“ für Nintendo 3DS gilt es, kurze Herausforderungen zu meistern, die auf klassischen Nintendo-Titeln wie „Super Mario Bros.“, „Metroid“ und vielen anderen beruhen. Remix-Level stellen die Regeln auf den Kopf und verleihen diesen Spielen völlig neue Wendungen: Charaktere tauchen an ungewohnten Orten auf, Bildschirme stehen plötzlich kopf und Farben werden ausgetauscht!

movies.name: Ultimate NES Remix: Trailer zum Verkaufsstart

AU.name: Ultimate NES™ Remix
AU.description: In Ultimate NES™ Remix on Nintendo 3DS, players take on bite-sized challenges based on classic Nintendo titles such as Super Mario Bros., Metroid and more. Remix stages rework the rules and give these games all-new twists: characters turn up in unfamiliar places, screens are flipped upside down and colours are swapped around!

BG.name: Ultimate NES™ Remix
BG.description: In Ultimate NES™ Remix on Nintendo 3DS, players take on bite-sized challenges based on classic Nintendo titles such as Super Mario Bros., Metroid and more. Remix stages rework the rules and give these games all-new twists: characters turn up in unfamiliar places, screens are flipped upside down and colours are swapped around!

BE.name: Ultimate NES™ Remix
BE.description: Dans Ultimate NES™ Remix sur Nintendo 3DS, les joueurs relèvent des défis pixellisés inspirés de grands classiques Nintendo comme Super Mario Bros., Metroid, et bien d'autres. Dans les stages Remix, les règles ne sont plus les mêmes et vous découvrez les jeux sous un nouveau jour : des personnages se retrouvent dans des endroits inhabituels, les écrans sont sens dessus dessous, et les couleurs sont chamboulées !

movies.name: Ultimate NES Remix : bande-annonce de lancement

ES.name: Ultimate NES™ Remix
ES.description: En Ultimate NES™ Remix para Nintendo 3DS, los jugadores se enfrentan a retos de 8 bits basados en clásicos de Nintendo como Super Mario Bros., Metroid y muchos más. En los niveles Remix cualquier cosa puede pasar: personajes que aparecen en juegos que no les corresponden, pantallas que se ponen patas arriba, intercambio de colores, etc.

movies.name: Ultimate NES Remix: Tráiler de lanzamiento

IT.name: Ultimate NES™ Remix
IT.description: In Ultimate NES™ Remix per Nintendo 3DS, i giocatori affrontano piccole sfide basate su grandi classici Nintendo come Super Mario Bros., Metroid e molti altri giochi. I livelli Remix stravolgono le regole e danno a questi giochi una prospettiva completamente nuova: i personaggi si ritrovano in luoghi a loro sconosciuti, le schermate vengono completamente capovolte e i colori sono invertiti!

movies.name: Ultimate NES Remix: trailer di lancio

Remix stages rework the rules and give these games all-new twists: characters turn up in unfamiliar places, screens are flipped upside down and colours are swapped around!

NL.name: Ultimate NES™ Remix
NL.description: In Ultimate NES™ Remix voor de Nintendo 3DS gaan spelers hapklare uitdagingen aan die gebaseerd zijn op klassieke Nintendo-games zoals Super Mario Bros. en Metroid. In de Remix-levels gaan alle regels overboord en kun je bekende games in een nieuw jasje beleven. In deze speciale levels is alles mogelijk: personages duiken op in levels waar ze eigenlijk niet thuishoren, het beeld wordt ondersteboven gezet, en kleuren worden omgewisseld!

NZ.name: Ultimate NES™ Remix
NZ.description: In Ultimate NES™ Remix on Nintendo 3DS, players take on bite-sized challenges based on classic Nintendo titles such as Super Mario Bros., Metroid and more. Remix stages rework the rules and give these games all-new twists: characters turn up in unfamiliar places, screens are flipped upside down and colours are swapped around!

PL.description: In Ultimate NES™ Remix on Nintendo 3DS, players take on bite-sized challenges based on classic Nintendo titles such as Super Mario Bros., Metroid and more. Remix stages rework the rules and give these games all-new twists: characters turn up in unfamiliar places, screens are flipped upside down and colours are swapped around!

PT.name: Ultimate NES™ Remix
PT.description: Ultimate NES™ Remix chega às consolas Nintendo 3DS para te permitir levar as melhores remisturas retro para onde quer que vás! Tenta superar mais de 250 desafios de 8 bits baseados em momentos clássicos de 16 títulos lançados originalmente para a NES, incluindo Super Mario Bros., Punch-Out!!, The Legend of Zelda, Metroid, entre muitos outros!

movies.name: Ultimate NES Remix: Trailer de lançamento

RU.name: Ultimate NES™ Remix
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. В игре Ultimate NES™ Remix на Nintendo 3DS игрокам предстоит пройти ретро-испытания из таких классических игр Nintendo, как Super Mario Bros., Metroid и другие. Ремикс-уровни переосмысливают привычные правила и придают этим играм элемент неожиданности: персонажи оказываются в незнакомых местах, экраны переворачиваются вверх ногами, меняется цветовая палитра!

movies.name: Ultimate NES Remix: трейлер к выходу игры
